bug.short_desc: Use upstream desktop file instead of bundled one
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The mumble RPM package embeds its own desktop file (http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/mumble.git/tree/mumble.desktop) instead of using the one from upstream (https://github.com/mumble-voip/mumble/blob/master/scripts/mumble.desktop), maybe for historical reasons. The downstream desktop file is lacking several features from the upstream one, most notably support for mumble:// URLs. Should we simply drop the bundled desktop file and use the upstream one?
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): mumble-1.2.18-1.fc25.x86_64
mumble-1.2.19-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-4213157afa
